title: I didn’t make the list
post:
Just as surprised as you are, we are more surprised we made his short list.  
FYI ~ Our site was hacked and I am working to restore it.  If anyone gets a 404 error (site not found), please note we hope to have this fixed soon.
author: Andy Weiss

title: I didn’t make the list
post: I wouldn’t worry about it, dan.  I love this website.
author: tony

title: I didn’t make the list
post:
Thank you for your comments!  I resolve to amend this omission! Here are Resurrection NOW, Inc. we accept that Christ’ Resurrection from the Dead is a Singular and Unrepeatable Event that happened in history, and exceeds history.  
For this reason, our post-modern world can become, more and more clear – that this Singularity actually happened, and more and more clear, concerning how to enter Our Lord’s Event Horizon – so that we become Singular People – the True Meaning of Ecclesia – the People Called Out – just as St. Augustine says, VOCANS TEMPORALES – FACIENS AETERNOS!
author: Francis J. DeStefano
